basics.name: Ibrahim Patel
basics.label: DevOps Engineer at Accenture UK
basics.summary:
Proficient Linux Administrator + DevOps Engineer having 7+ years of experience with an absolute focus for automation since day one, seeking to use proven scripting and brainstorming skills to improve cost and performance.
Versatile collaborator with a deep commitment to a reliable and successful business, eager to learn & grow at a high pace.

Technically minded, calm, and methodical.

work.name: Tech Mahindra
work.summary: Client/Project : BT , Location : Onsite Ipswich, United Kingdom
highlights: Managed infra build and provisioning, software installation and maintenance of over 100+ Test & PreProduction environments.

Implemented innovative ideas and mechanised approaches to speed up repetitive administration
BAU tasks & zero downtime deployments.

Created environment health check tool of entire application using shell scripting, SQL and DevOps
tools like Jenkins, Ansible, minimising 90% human efforts.

Set up of DevOps monitoring tools like checkmk, ELK stack and Grafana to continuously monitor
server and application logs.
Built Dev & Test environments for micro services using containerization tools like Docker.

Collaborating with the team to identify and fix problems and guiding team through technical issues
and challenges.

Presented technical demonstration of automation work and sharing innovative ideas several times
with higher management & clients.
Eliminated human errors and reduced deployment time window from 5hours to 10mins.
Exercised monitoring & daily BAU tasks lead to 80% reduction of e2e errors/complaints.

Reduced costs by $5000 each quarter by automating monthly patches, environment setup using
Ansible roles and playbook

work.name: Tech Mahindra
work.summary: Client/Project : BT , Location : Offshore Kolkata, India.
highlights: Led the migration project involving upgrade of Linux version, Oracle database & WebLogic.
Designed, documented and executed server maintenance procedures, including system upgrades, patch management & system backups.
Constructed Jenkins pipeline projects for auto deployments, cutting down outage window by 5 hours/release.
Key achievement: Automation of BAU tasks helped in getting more business & migration projects

awards.title: ACE Award
awards.summary: Awarded an ACER for being an exceptional performer over the past two years period having achieved the highest rating in the Annual Appraisal Process for 2019-20 & 2020-21 at Tech Mahindra Ltd.

awards.title: ACE Award
awards.summary: Awarded an ACER for being an exceptional performer over the two years period having achieved the highest rating in the Annual Appraisal Process for 2017-18 & 2018-19 at Tech Mahindra Ltd.

awards.title: Digital Warrior
awards.summary:
Tech Mahindra recognizes and rewards employee with 'Digital Warrior Award' who brings out unique ideas towards digitization and automation.

Rewarded as Digital Warrior for implementing the fully automated deployment of applications using Jenkins and Shell scripting completely reducing human errors and service downtime.

certificates.name: Red Hat Certified Delivery Specialist - Automation 1
AWS Academy Graduate - AWS Academy Cloud Architecting

references.name: Senjuti Kundu
references.reference: Ibrahim is an excellent team player professionally and he is friendly too. He is very calm and composed even at critical situation and has immense knowledge in automation. I would definitely recommend Ibrahim as a colleague.
